tool_description: The Email Validator API checks if an email address is valid and reliable by verifying its format, domain reachability, and whether it's from a disposable/temporary email service.
name: Email Validator
title: Email Validator

api_list.name: Check email details [DEPRECATED]

utterances.utterance: Can you verify if john.doe@example.com is a valid email address?
Please check if the email address jane.smith@temporarymail.com is reliable.
Is the email contact@business.org a valid and reachable address?
Can you confirm the validity of support@service.net?
Check if info@company.co is a disposable email.
Is sales@shop.com a valid email address?
Please verify the email address admin@website.org for validity.
Can you check if feedback@service.com is a reliable email?
Is the email newsletter@news.com valid and not from a temporary service?
Verify if the email address hello@world.net is valid.

api_list.name: Check Email Details
api_list.description:
Validates against RFC standards
Checks if  it's from a disposable/temporary email service
Checks for MX records (if false it's probably a fake email)
Connects to SMTP to check if the account exists (`null` means SMTP wasn't reached)

utterances.utterance: Can you verify if john.doe@example.com is a valid email address?
Please check if the email address jane.smith@temporarymail.com is from a disposable service.
Is the email address contact@mybusiness.org reliable and reachable?
Validate the email address support@company.com for me.
Check if the email address info@nonexistentdomain.xyz has valid MX records.
Can you confirm if the email address admin@reliablemail.net exists?
Please verify the email address feedback@serviceprovider.com for validity.
Is the email address newsletter@updates.org a temporary email?
Check if the email address sales@ecommerce.com is formatted correctly.
Can you validate the email address hello@personalblog.com for me?
